attributes.action: settle international disagreements by jelly wrestling.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fighting and killing people is no way to win any argument. If the Prime Minister were to introduce jelly wrestling as a means to settling international disputes, costs of all kinds could be drastically reduced and people could live in peace. (The jelly industry would also do very nicely out of it.)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
